mapper.select: SELECT A.C_RESUMENDEMANDA, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.N_ID_CASO, A.C_ARCHIVADO FROM SIMCO_ANALISIS_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE A.N_ID_CASO = #{id}

SELECT A.C_RESUMENDEMANDA, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOMATACTOR, A.N_ID_ACTOR, A.N_ID_CASO, A.C_ARCHIVADO FROM SIMCO_ANALISIS_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE A.N_ID_CASO = #{caso.id} AND A.N_ID_ACTOR = #{actor.id}
SELECT A.*, B.C_NOMACTOR, B.C_APELLIDOPATACTOR FROM SIMCO_ANALISIS_ACTOR A INNER JOIN SIMCO_REG_ACTOR B ON A.N_ID_ACTOR = B.N_ID_ACTOR WHERE A.N_ID_CASO = #{caso.id} AND A.N_ID_ACTOR = #{actor.id}
